environmentVariables.description: Communication timeout in milliseconds

environmentVariables.description: Enable or disable oscilloscope beeper sounds

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_TEMP_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Custom directory for temporary files (waveforms, screenshots). Required for Docker if you need to access captured data outside the container. Mount a volume to this path.

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_RESOURCE
environmentVariables.description: VISA resource string for connecting to the oscilloscope (e.g., 'TCPIP0::192.168.1.100::inst0::INSTR').

environmentVariables.name: VISA_TIMEOUT
environmentVariables.description: Communication timeout in milliseconds

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_BEEPER_ENABLED
environmentVariables.description: Enable or disable oscilloscope beeper sounds

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_TEMP_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Host-side path for returned file paths. The container writes to /tmp/rigol internally and translates paths to this value in responses. Must match the host path in your -v mount. Required for Docker usage.

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_RESOURCE
environmentVariables.description: VISA resource string for connecting to the oscilloscope (e.g., 'TCPIP0::192.168.1.100::inst0::INSTR').

environmentVariables.name: VISA_TIMEOUT
environmentVariables.description: Communication timeout in milliseconds

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_BEEPER_ENABLED
environmentVariables.description: Enable or disable oscilloscope beeper sounds

server.name: io.github.alex-feel/mcp-context-server
server.description: An MCP server that provides persistent multimodal context storage for LLM agents.

environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Log level

environmentVariables.name: MAX_IMAGE_SIZE_MB
environmentVariables.description: Maximum individual image size in megabytes

environmentVariables.name: MAX_TOTAL_SIZE_MB
environmentVariables.description: Maximum total request size in megabytes

environmentVariables.name: DB_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Custom database file location path

environmentVariables.name: POOL_MAX_READERS
environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of concurrent read connections in the pool

environmentVariables.name: POOL_MAX_WRITERS
environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of concurrent write connections in the pool

environmentVariables.name: POOL_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_S
environmentVariables.description: Connection timeout in seconds

environmentVariables.name: POOL_IDLE_TIMEOUT_S
environmentVariables.description: Idle connection timeout in seconds

environmentVariables.name: POOL_HEALTH_CHECK_INTERVAL_S
environmentVariables.description: Connection health check interval in seconds

environmentVariables.name: RETRY_MAX_RETRIES
environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations

environmentVariables.name: RETRY_BASE_DELAY_S
environmentVariables.description: Base delay in seconds between retry attempts

environmentVariables.name: RETRY_MAX_DELAY_S
environmentVariables.description: Maximum delay in seconds between retry attempts

environmentVariables.name: RETRY_JITTER
environmentVariables.description: Enable random jitter in retry delays

environmentVariables.name: RETRY_BACKOFF_FACTOR
environmentVariables.description: Exponential backoff multiplication factor for retries

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_FOREIGN_KEYS
environmentVariables.description: Enable SQLite foreign key constraints

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_JOURNAL_MODE
environmentVariables.description: SQLite journal mode (e.g., WAL, DELETE)

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_SYNCHRONOUS
environmentVariables.description: SQLite synchronous mode (e.g., NORMAL, FULL, OFF)

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_TEMP_STORE
environmentVariables.description: SQLite temporary storage location (e.g., MEMORY, FILE)

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_MMAP_SIZE
environmentVariables.description: SQLite memory-mapped I/O size in bytes

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_CACHE_SIZE
environmentVariables.description: SQLite cache size (negative value for KB, positive for pages)

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_PAGE_SIZE
environmentVariables.description: SQLite page size in bytes

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_WAL_AUTOCHECKPOINT
environmentVariables.description: SQLite WAL autocheckpoint threshold in pages

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_BUSY_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: SQLite busy timeout in milliseconds

environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_WAL_CHECKPOINT
environmentVariables.description: SQLite WAL checkpoint mode (e.g., PASSIVE, FULL, RESTART)

environmentVariables.name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_S
environmentVariables.description: Server shutdown timeout in seconds

environmentVariables.name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_TEST_S
environmentVariables.description: Test mode shutdown timeout in seconds

environmentVariables.name: QUEUE_TIMEOUT_S
environmentVariables.description: Queue operation timeout in seconds

environmentVariables.name: QUEUE_TIMEOUT_TEST_S
environmentVariables.description: Test mode queue timeout in seconds

environmentVariables.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_FAILURE_THRESHOLD
environmentVariables.description: Circuit breaker failure threshold before opening

environmentVariables.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_RECOVERY_TIMEOUT_S
environmentVariables.description: Circuit breaker recovery timeout in seconds

environmentVariables.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_HALF_OPEN_MAX_CALLS
environmentVariables.description: Maximum calls allowed in circuit breaker half-open state

server.name: io.github.cr7258/elasticsearch-mcp-server
server.description: MCP server for interacting with Elasticsearch

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of Elasticsearch hosts (e.g., https://localhost:9200)

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for Elasticsearch or Elastic Cloud authentication (recommended)

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
environmentVariables.description: Username for basic authentication (alternative to API key)

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Password for basic authentication (used with ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME)

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_VERIFY_CERTS
environmentVariables.description: Whether to verify SSL certificates (true/false)

environmentVariables.description: Authentication mode to use: 'none', 'jwt', or 'oauth'.

environmentVariables.name: MT_GOOGLE_MAP_KEY
environmentVariables.description: [Map] Google Map API key

environmentVariables.name: MT_GEMINI_IMAGE_KEY
environmentVariables.description: [Image.gemini] Gemini Image Api key

environmentVariables.name: MT_MAX_RETRY_GEMINI
environmentVariables.description: [Image.gemini] Number of retries when generating Gemini images Default: 0

environmentVariables.name: MT_AVATAR_IMAGE_URI
environmentVariables.description: [Image.gemini] Character reference image uri (file:// or https://) when generating Gemini image. Multiple settings can be made by separating them with the '|'. When multiple settings are made, they will be selected randomly.

environmentVariables.name: MT_MAP_API_URL
environmentVariables.description: [Map.etc] Optional: Map API custom endpoint. Example: direction=https://xxxx,places=https://yyyy

environmentVariables.name: MT_TIME_SCALE
environmentVariables.description: [Map] Optional:Scale of travel time on real roads duration. default 4

environmentVariables.name: MT_SQLITE_PATH
environmentVariables.description: [db.local] db save path: e.g. %USERPROFILE%/Desktop/traveler.sqlite ,$HOME/traveler.sqlite

environmentVariables.name: MT_TURSO_URL
environmentVariables.description: [db.api] Turso sqlite API URL

environmentVariables.name: MT_TURSO_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: [db.api] Turso sqlite API access token

environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_PATH
environmentVariables.description: [rembg.local] absolute path of the installed rembg cli

environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_URL
environmentVariables.description: [rembg.api] withoutbg.com rembg API URL

environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_WO_KEY
environmentVariables.description: [rembg.api] withoutbg.com rembg API key

environmentVariables.name: MT_PIXAI_KEY
environmentVariables.description: [Image.pixAi] pixAi API key

environmentVariables.name: MT_SD_KEY
environmentVariables.description: [Image.sd] Stability.ai image generation API key

environmentVariables.name: MT_PIXAI_MODEL_ID
environmentVariables.description: [Image.pixAi] Optional: pixAi ModelId, if not set use default model 1648918127446573124

environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_URL
environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Option: Generate image using ComfyUI API at specified URL. Example: http://192.168.1.100:8188

environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_T2I
environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path to API workflow file when using text to image with ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/t2i_sample.json

environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_I2I
environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path of API workflow file when image to image in ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/i2i_sample.json

environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_PARAMS
environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Variable values to send to the workflow via comfyUI API

environmentVariables.name: MT_FIXED_MODEL_PROMPT
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Fixed avatar generation prompt. You will no longer be able to change your avatar during conversations.

environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_AREA_RATIO
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image area ratio. default 0.042

environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_HW_RATIO
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image aspect ratios. default 1.5~2.3

environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_W
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window horizontal ratio. default 0.5

environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_H
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window aspect ratio. default 0.75

environmentVariables.name: MT_BS_ID
environmentVariables.description: [Sns.Bs] Bluesky sns registration address

environmentVariables.name: MT_BS_PASS
environmentVariables.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns password

environmentVariables.name: MT_BS_HANDLE
environmentVariables.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns handle name: e.g. xxxxxxxx.bsky.social

environmentVariables.name: MT_FILTER_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: [etc] Optional: Directly filter the tools to be used. All are available if not specified. e.g. tips,set_traveler_location

environmentVariables.name: MT_MOVE_MODE
environmentVariables.description: [etc] Option: Specify whether the movement mode is 'realtime' or 'skip'. default realtime

environmentVariables.name: MT_IMAGE_WIDTH
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Option: Output image width (pixels) Default is 512

environmentVariables.name: MT_NO_IMAGE
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Options: 'true' = do not output image, not specified = output image if possible, default is not specified

environmentVariables.name: MT_NO_AVATAR
environmentVariables.description: [Image] Option: 'true' = Output StreetView image as is without avatar superimposition. Not specified = Superimpose avatar image. Default is not specified.

environmentVariables.name: MT_FEED_TAG
environmentVariables.description: [Sns] Optional: Specify the feed tag when posting to SNS (#required, 15 characters or more) Default is #geo_less_traveler

environmentVariables.name: MT_MAX_SESSIONS
environmentVariables.description: [Streamable-http] Maximum number of sessions when using Streamable-http

environmentVariables.name: MT_SESSION_TTL_MS
environmentVariables.description: [Streamable-http] Session TTL when using Streamable-http

environmentVariables.name: MT_SERVICE_TTL_MS
environmentVariables.description: [Streamable-http] Service TTL when using Streamable-http

server.name: io.github.mongodb-js/mongodb-mcp-server
server.description: MongoDB Model Context Protocol Server

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_ID
environmentVariables.description: Atlas API client ID for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Atlas API client secret for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_ATLAS_TEMPORARY_DATABASE_USER_LIFETIME_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds that temporary database users created when connecting to MongoDB Atlas clusters will remain active before being automatically deleted.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: An array of tool names that require user confirmation before execution. Requires the client to support elicitation.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_CONNECTION_STRING
environmentVariables.description: MongoDB connection string for direct database connections. Optional, if not set, you'll need to call the connect tool before interacting with MongoDB data.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLE_EMBEDDINGS_VALIDATION
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, disables validation of embeddings dimensions.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: An array of tool names, operation types, and/or categories of tools that will be disabled.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds between export cleanup cycles that remove expired export files.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds after which an export is considered expired and eligible for cleanup.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORTS_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Folder to store exported data files.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Host address to bind the HTTP server to (only used when transport is 'http').

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port number for the HTTP server (only used when transport is 'http').

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Idle timeout for a client to disconnect (only applies to http transport).

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_INDEX_CHECK
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, enforces that query operations must use an index, rejecting queries that perform a collection scan.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_LOG_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Folder to store logs.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_LOGGERS
environmentVariables.description: Comma separated values, possible values are 'mcp', 'disk' and 'stderr'.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_BYTES_PER_QUERY
environmentVariables.description: The maximum size in bytes for results from a find or aggregate tool call. This serves as an upper bound for the responseBytesLimit parameter in those tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_DOCUMENTS_PER_QUERY
environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of documents that can be returned by a find or aggregate tool call. For the find tool, the effective limit will be the smaller of this value and the tool's limit parameter.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_NOTIFICATION_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Notification timeout for a client to be aware of disconnect (only applies to http transport).

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_READ_ONLY
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, only allows read, connect, and metadata operation types, disabling create/update/delete operations.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_TELEMETRY
environmentVariables.description: When set to disabled, disables telemetry collection.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_TRANSPORT
environmentVariables.description: Either 'stdio' or 'http'.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_VOYAGE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for Voyage AI embeddings service (required for vector search operations with text-to-embedding conversion).

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_ID
environmentVariables.description: Atlas API client ID for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Atlas API client secret for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_ATLAS_TEMPORARY_DATABASE_USER_LIFETIME_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds that temporary database users created when connecting to MongoDB Atlas clusters will remain active before being automatically deleted.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: An array of tool names that require user confirmation before execution. Requires the client to support elicitation.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_CONNECTION_STRING
environmentVariables.description: MongoDB connection string for direct database connections. Optional, if not set, you'll need to call the connect tool before interacting with MongoDB data.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLE_EMBEDDINGS_VALIDATION
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, disables validation of embeddings dimensions.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: An array of tool names, operation types, and/or categories of tools that will be disabled.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds between export cleanup cycles that remove expired export files.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds after which an export is considered expired and eligible for cleanup.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORTS_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Folder to store exported data files.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Host address to bind the HTTP server to (only used when transport is 'http').

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port number for the HTTP server (only used when transport is 'http').

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Idle timeout for a client to disconnect (only applies to http transport).

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_INDEX_CHECK
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, enforces that query operations must use an index, rejecting queries that perform a collection scan.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_LOG_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Folder to store logs.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_LOGGERS
environmentVariables.description: Comma separated values, possible values are 'mcp', 'disk' and 'stderr'.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_BYTES_PER_QUERY
environmentVariables.description: The maximum size in bytes for results from a find or aggregate tool call. This serves as an upper bound for the responseBytesLimit parameter in those tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_DOCUMENTS_PER_QUERY
environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of documents that can be returned by a find or aggregate tool call. For the find tool, the effective limit will be the smaller of this value and the tool's limit parameter.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_NOTIFICATION_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Notification timeout for a client to be aware of disconnect (only applies to http transport).

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_READ_ONLY
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, only allows read, connect, and metadata operation types, disabling create/update/delete operations.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_TELEMETRY
environmentVariables.description: When set to disabled, disables telemetry collection.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_TRANSPORT
environmentVariables.description: Either 'stdio' or 'http'.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_VOYAGE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for Voyage AI embeddings service (required for vector search operations with text-to-embedding conversion).

server.name: io.github.schemacrawler/schemacrawler-ai
server.description: Enables natural language schema queries — explore tables, keys, procedures, and get SQL help fast

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_USER
environmentVariables.description: Database user name. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Database user password. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_JDBC_URL
environmentVariables.description: JDBC URL for database connection. If this is provided, the server, host, port and database are not used.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_SERVER
environmentVariables.description: SchemaCrawler database plugin, for example, 'sqlserver' or 'sqlite'. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Database host. Defaults to localhost. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Database port. Defaults to the default port for the server type. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE
environmentVariables.description: Database to connect to (optional). Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_INFO_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: How much database metadata to retrieve. Values are 'minimum', 'standard', 'detailed' or 'maximum'.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging verbosity level. Values are 'SEVERE', 'WARNING', 'INFO', 'CONFIG', or 'FINE'.

server.name: io.github.shinpr/mcp-local-rag
server.description: Easy-to-setup local RAG server with minimal configuration

environmentVariables.name: BASE_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Base directory for document storage (defaults to current working directory)

environmentVariables.name: DB_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to LanceDB database directory (defaults to ./lancedb/)

environmentVariables.name: CACHE_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Directory where Transformers.js models are cached (defaults to ./models/)

environmentVariables.name: MODEL_NAME
environmentVariables.description: Embedding model name (defaults to Xenova/all-MiniLM-L6-v2)

environmentVariables.name: MAX_FILE_SIZE
environmentVariables.description: Maximum file size in bytes (defaults to 104857600 / 100MB)

environmentVariables.name: CHUNK_SIZE
environmentVariables.description: Text chunk size for splitting documents (defaults to 512)

environmentVariables.name: CHUNK_OVERLAP
environmentVariables.description: Overlap between consecutive chunks (defaults to 100)
